sorcer.core.context

Class ComprehensiveContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<String,T>
        • sorcer.core.context.ServiceContext
          • sorcer.core.context.ComprehensiveContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Remote, Map, InclusiveContext, Arg, AssociativeContext, Context, Contexter, Evaluation, Identifiable, Invocation, Mappable, Revaluation, Service

    public class ComprehensiveContext
extends ServiceContext
implements InclusiveContext
    The Comprehensive Context is a data structure designed to enable CDS providers to encapsulate the query for data from multiple EDS providers into a single request. This data structure is also designed to be a container for the view of data which satisfies the query. The ComprehensiveContext can return an iterator which can iterate through the tuples which satisfy the query. It also returns a metaata object which basically contains information about the attributes of the query. Additionally, the ComprehensiveContext can return a object which can return each attributed in various data type formats as requested.
    Author:
    Thimmayya Ame
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • putValue

        public Object putValue(String path,
                       Object value)
                throws ContextException
        Description copied from interface: Mappable
        Maps the specified path to the specified value in this mappable. Neither the path nor the value can be null.

        The value can be retrieved by calling the getValue method with a path that is equal to the original path.

        Specified by:
        putValue in interface AssociativeContext
        Specified by:
        putValue in interface Mappable
        Overrides:
        putValue in class ServiceContext
        Parameters:
        path - the attribute-based path
        value - the new value
        Returns:
        the previous value of the specified path in this mappable, or null if it did not have one
        Throws:
        ContextException
